articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About us
            
            
            Clara Pau
            Clara is an applied social researcher from Central Otago. She works closely with Athletics NZ, Canoe Racing NZ, and Netball NZ and has a focus on information gathering in high performance athlete development across NSOs. To high performance sport, she has brought experience in working with communities to undertake culturally competent research, coupling this with effective information gathering techniques that produce meaningful outcomes for communities without compromising cultural safety.
            She has spent time in New Orleans, Louisiana, as part of a Fulbright Graduate Award where she worked on projects concerning political views and voting patterns in Louisiana state, and representation on local boards. She is currently learning te reo Māori and full-stack web development, and enjoys music, NFL, and the outdoors.
            
            
            Dr Jacquie Tran
            Jacquie is a sport scientist and researcher from Melbourne, Australia. Her major areas of interest include: physical preparation and recovery practices for elite athlete and team performance, applying data science techniques to investigate technical and tactical performance in team sport, and organisational learning and mastery practices in performance-focused settings.
            Throughout her career to date, she has provided research leadership and / or direct scientific support to elite athletes, coaches, and support staff in NZ sport (including Rowing NZ, Snow Sports NZ, Hockey NZ, Surf Life Saving NZ, NZ Olympic Committee, and Paralympics NZ) and Australian sport (Australian Institute of Sport, Rowing Australia, Geelong Cats Football Club (Australian Football League), Victorian Institute of Sport). Outside of sport, Jacquie enjoys baking, playing video games, and exploring New Zealand.
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited

articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            At Flame Trees, we provide research and advisory services to maximise organisational learning and inform the design and implementation of strategy.
            We have expertise in gathering information, managing it with care, and transforming information into useful insights, especially in sporting and community contexts.
            Get in touch with us: info@flametrees.co.nz
            
            Image credit: Jan Smith
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited

              Get in touch with us: info@flametrees.co.nz
              
              Image credit: Jan Smith

articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Privacy statement
            We collect your personal information in order to conduct research and consulting activities that we have been contracted to carry out by third parties.
            If you access any of our services (e.g., as a client engaging us to carry out research and consulting services, as a participant in research surveys / interviews / focus groups), we will collect some or all of the following personal information:
            Your name and contact information
            Your address or region
            Your correspondence with Flame Trees Limited staff
            Demographic information such as date of birth, age, gender, and ethnicity
            Survey results and responses, when you participate in any of our surveys
            Interview and focus group recordings and transcripts, when you participate in any of our interviews and / or focus groups
            Any other information you choose to provide us.
            We may also collect personal information from third parties where it is necessary for us to carry out the research and consulting services we have been contracted to complete.
            We keep your information safe by storing it in encrypted files on cloud servers and only allowing certain staff to access it. We keep your information for 6 years after completing the work for which the information was collected, at which point we securely destroy it by securely erasing all digital copies.
            You have the right to ask for a copy of any personal information we hold about you, and to ask for it to be corrected if you think it is wrong. If you’d like to ask for a copy of your information, or to have it corrected, please contact us at info@flametrees.co.nz.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited
